text: Giuseppe Furino (born 5 July 1946) is a former Italian football player. He has played for Italy national team. ==Club career statistics== |- |1966–67||rowspan="2"|Savona||Serie B||32||1 |- |1967–68||Serie C||29||6 |- |1968–69||Palermo||Serie A||27||1 |- |1969–70||rowspan="15"|Juventus||rowspan="15"|Serie A||30||2 |- |1970–71||27||1 |- |1971–72||27||2 |- |1972–73||27||0 |- |1973–74||24||0 |- |1974–75||28||0 |- |1975–76||26||2 |- |1976–77||26||1 |- |1977–78||26||0 |- |1978–79||22||0 |- |1979–80||25||0 |- |1980–81||24||0 |- |1981–82||27||0 |- |1982–83||21||0 |- |1983–84||1||0 449||16 449||16 |} ==International career statistics== |- |1970||1||0 |- |1971||0||0 |- |1972||0||0 |- |1973||1||0 |- |1974||1||0 |- !Total||3||0 |} ==Honours== Juventus * Serie A: 1971–72, 1972–73, 1974–75, 1976–77, 1977–78, 1980–81, 1981–82, 1983–84 * Coppa Italia: 1978–79, 1982–83 * UEFA Cup: 1976–77 * UEFA Cup Winners' Cup: 1983–84 * Intercontinental Cup: Runner-up: 1973 * European Cup: Runner-up: 1972–73,1972–73 All matches – season at UEFA website 1982–831982–83 All matches – season at UEFA website * Inter-Cities Fairs Cup Runner-up: 1970-71website eurocups-uefa.ru Fairs' Cup Seasons 1970-71 – results, protocols Italy * FIFA World Cup: runner-up 1970 ==References== Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Sicily Category:Sportspeople from Palermo
